Title.evidence: Neoadjuvant 177 Lu-DOTATATE for NF-PanNETs: A Phase II Randomised Controlled Trial

Trial_Design.evidence: A sample size of 30 was calculated to test postoperative complication rates against predefined cut-offs.

Participants.evidence: Eligible participants were adults with sporadic, resectable or potentially resectable NF-PanNETs, positive 68 Ga-DOTA PET, and at least one high-risk feature.

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to evaluate the safety of neoadjuvant 177 Lu-DOTATATE followed by surgery in high-risk NF-PanNETs.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary endpoint was safety, assessed by postoperative morbidity and mortality within 90 days.

Number_Randomised.evidence: From March 2020 to February 2023, 31 patients were enrolled

Result_Outcome.evidence: Partial radiological response was observed in 18 patients, with stable disease in 13.

Harms.evidence: No postoperative deaths occurred, but complications were noted in 21 patients, with severe complications in seven.
